name: Chingling
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chimecho from your hand onto Chingling (this counts as evolving Chingling) and remove all damage counters from Chingling.

attacks.name: Uproar
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
